medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe short stature and absence of catch-up growth since birth.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms began at birth with severe intrauterine growth retardation (IUGR). At 3 years and 7 months, his length was 62.4 cm and weight was 5.15 kg. Overall growth has been poor since birth without any catch-up growth.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Congenital CMV infection at birth. Hospital admission at 18 months for pneumonia. Pregnancy characterized by severe intrauterine growth retardation. Karyotype 46,XY.
